original_text: You people who live in Aroer, stand beside the road and watch. Ask the people who are running away what has happened. You people who live in Aroer,
korean_text: 아로엘에 사는 여인이여 길 곁에 서서 지키며 도망하는 자와 피하는 자에게 무슨 일이 생겼는지 물을지어다

sentences.original_text: You people who live in Aroer
stand beside the road and watch
Ask the people who are running away
You people who live in Aroer
